title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente. 2. In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy. 3. Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl. 4. Drain the pasta, reserving some water, and add it to the pan with pancetta. 5. Remove from heat, add the egg mixture, and toss quickly, adding reserved water as needed to create a creamy sauce. 6. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
